title: Tell us Dr. John Ioannidis, Exactly Who is Waging This “War on Science”?
description: When science was under attack, Dr. John Ioannidis played the role of enabler. Along with his copious COVID misinformation, that will be his permanent legacy. The post Tell us Dr. John Ioannidis, Exactly Who is Waging This “War on Science”? first appeared on Science-Based Medicine.
author: Jonathan Howard
